title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed, indigo dyed
description: Hanging or large panel in two shades of indigo. Design shows a large-scale tree or vine with stylized pineapple, flowers, leaves and a large long-tailed bird.
